column1: Uchi////The food orgy began. I think we had just a little of everything
column2: both hot and cold. We started with Brussels sprouts - outside of dessert
column3: this was the one request we made of the server. For me
column4: these were unexpected at a sushi restaurant
column5: but a completely delicious way to start the meal. From there it was a whirlwind of food
column7: a couple of cold items and then a hot item
column8: then back to cold. I believe our hot items were duck
column10: tuna and wagyu beef - all cooked perfectly. The one item I didn't "get" was the salad
column11: which came near the end of our meal - I didn't love the dressing or the timing. The salad was but a blip on an otherwise perfect meal.
